name: Levity
cleanBio: Levity is an electronic Trio comprised of Chicago’s John Hauldren, Los Angeles’s PJ Carberry, and Minnesota's Josh Tarum. Their colorful sounds, upbeat drums, and euphoric soundscapes coated with playful vocals will transport you to the beach no matter where you are. Having only started in 2019, the Levity boys have amassed over 3 million streams across all platforms and landed official remix’s for some of the biggest names in music like Tinashe, Louis The Child, Quinn XCII, Chelsea Cutler, and Silent Child. Their live shows are known for their unique stage energy, crowd interaction, and artistic blend of electronic sub-genres, as they aren’t there to just DJ, but to put on a performance.
